page.title: 10Events In Norton Area.
page.content: {Parish Room, Sutton Maddock. } Here are held Parish Council meetings,rummage sales,children's parties, voting at elections and an annual Harvest Supper for Sutton Maddock Church. {Norton Flower Show. } This show takes place on Norton Sports Field in August, and has been held annually since 1946. There are open classes ,for home_ grown fruit, vegetables, flowers and plants, and for flower _ arrangements, cookery, handicrafts, wine and photographs. There are special classes for members of Apley British Legion, Norton Youth Club, Norton Football Club and Stockton Bowling Club. There are inter _ club classes for Women's Institutes and classes for young people.
